links.title: Tesla: Shareholders Trip Over Elon's Salesmanship
links.description: There is clearly demand for fully electric or hybrid vehicles. This is a given. What is very much unclear is just how much market share Tesla ( TSLA) will ultimately control. And more importantly, whether it will be able to run its business profitably enough to support the high expectations its stock price carries.
